p: The quantification of total phenolic compounds (TPC) was performed using the calibration curve, resulting in a content of 113.62 ± 1.09 mg TPC (GAE, gallic acid equivalents)/g dry plant, and the flavonoid content was 35.24 ± 0.55 mg (QE, quercetin equivalents)/g dry plant for the G. triachantos leaves extract.
